industry_overview: Financial technology (fintech) refers to the application of innovative technologies to products and services in the financial industry. It includes advancements such as mobile banking, online lending, digital payments, robo-advisors, and blockchain-based applications. Fintech companies range from startups to established firms aiming to improve, complement, or replace traditional financial services.
target_market_segment: Fintech targets a broad range of customer segments including retail consumers, small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), large corporations, and financial institutions seeking digital solutions for payments, lending, wealth management, insurance, and capital markets.
